improvements: Added isCliToolType() type guard to cli-tools/types.ts for safe runtime CLIToolType validation
Added getCliToolDisplayNameSafe() safe wrapper that handles undefined/unknown strings without unsafe casts
Removed duplicated getToolName() function from MessageList.tsx (was defined twice in two sub-components)
Removed formatCliToolName() from AutoYesToggle.tsx, replaced with centralized getCliToolDisplayNameSafe()
Eliminated unsafe 'as CLIToolType' casts in MessageList.tsx and AutoYesToggle.tsx display name logic
Refactored AgentSettingsPane handleCheckboxChange to use ref pattern, removing checkedIds from useCallback deps for stable callback identity
Extracted magic number 2 to MAX_SELECTED_AGENTS constant in AgentSettingsPane
Refactored NotesAndLogsPane tab buttons from 3 duplicated button blocks into data-driven SUB_TABS array with shared CSS constants
Added 10 new unit tests for isCliToolType() and getCliToolDisplayNameSafe() covering valid IDs, invalid IDs, edge cases, and custom fallbacks
